name: Asphyxia (itch) (Constanza)
description:
High school is almost over and you haven't confessed to your eternal crush. Will you have the chance before graduating?

Ari, the protagonist, has always been in love with the same girl. Since they were just kids. The thing is, should she confess her love? 

"Asphyxia" explores different opinions about getting out of the closet. 

Would you explore them, as well?
